Title: Silence of the Lambs
Description: A young FBI cadet must recieve the help of an incarcerated and manipulative cannibal killer.

Genre.Name: Thriller
Genre.Description: Thriller film, also known as suspense film or suspense thriller, is a broad film genre that involves excitement and suspense in the audience.

Director.Name: Jonathan Demme
Director.Bio: Robert Jonathan Demme was an American director, producer, and screenwriter.

Title: The Royal Tenenbaums
Description: Royal and Etheline Tenenbaum had three children and then seperated. Etheline raised the children all of whom were geniuses. Royal retrurns unexpectedly one winter.

Genre.Name: Drama
Genre.Description: Drama film is a genre that relies on the emotional and relational development of realistic characters.

Director.Name: Wes Anderson
Director.Bio: Wesley Wales Anderson is a writer and director who was born in Houston, Texas. He made his first film, Bottle Rocket with Owen Wilson in 1996.

Title: The Life Aquatic with Steve Zissou
Description: With a plan to exact revenge on a mythical shark that killed his partner, Oceanographer Steve Zissou rallies a crew that includes his estranged wife, a journalist, and a man who may or may not be his son.

Genre.Name: Drama
Genre.Description: Drama film is a genre that relies on the emotional and relational development of realistic characters.

Director.Name: Wes Anderson
Director.Bio: Wesley Wales Anderson is a writer and director who was born in Houston, Texas. He made his first film, Bottle Rocket with Owen Wilson in 1996.

Title: Her
Description: In a near future, a lonely writer develops an unlikely relationship with an operating system designed to meet his every need.

Genre.Name: Drama
Genre.Description: Drama film is a genre that relies on the emotional and relational development of realistic characters.

Director.Name: Spike Jonze
Director.Bio: Spike Jonze made up one-third along with Andy Jenkins and Mark Lewman of the trio behind Dirt Magazine. Jonze was also responsible for directing the famous Beastie Boys: Sabotage 1994 short film as well as numerous other music videos for various artists.

Title: Three Billboards Outside Ebbing, Missouri
Description: A mother personally challenges the local authorities to solve her daughter's murder when they fail to catch the culprit.

Genre.Name: Crime
Genre.Description: Crime films, in the broadest sense, are a cinematic genre inspired by and analogous to the crime fiction literary genre. Films of this genre generally involve various aspects of crime and its detection.

Director.Name: Martin McDonagh
Director.Bio: Martin McDonagh was born on March 26, 1970 in Camberwell, London, England. He is a writer and director, known for In Bruges (2008), Three Billboards Outside Ebbing, Missouri (2017) and Seven Psychopaths (2012).

Title: Lady Bird
Description: In 2002, an artistically inclined seventeen-year-old girl comes of age in Sacramento, California.

Genre.Name: Comedy
Genre.Description: A comedy film is a genre of film in which the main emphasis is on humour. These films are designed to make the audience laugh through amusement and most often work by exaggerating characteristics for humorous effect. Films in this style traditionally have a happy ending (black comedy being an exception).

Director.Name: Greta Gerwig
Director.Bio: Greta Gerwig is an American actress, playwright, screenwriter, and director. She has collaborated with Noah Baumbach on several films, including Greenberg, Frances Ha, and Mistress America. Gerwig made her solo directorial debut with the critically acclaimed comedy-drama film Lady Bird, which she also wrote.

Title: Moonlight
Description: A young African-American man grapples with his identity and sexuality while experiencing the everyday struggles of childhood, adolescence, and burgeoning adulthood.

Genre.Name: Drama
Genre.Description: Drama film is a genre that relies on the emotional and relational development of realistic characters. While Drama film relies heavily on this kind of development, dramatic themes play a large role in the plot as well. Often, these dramatic themes are taken from intense, real life issues.

Director.Name: Barry Jenkins
Director.Bio: Barry Jenkins was born on November 19, 1979 in Miami, Florida, USA. He is a director and writer, known for If Beale Street Could Talk, Moonlight and Medicine for Melancholy.

Title: Seven Psychopaths
Description: A struggling screenwriter inadvertently becomes entangled in the Los Angeles criminal underworld after his oddball friends kidnap a gangster's beloved Shih Tzu.

Genre.Name: Comedy
Genre.Description: A comedy film is a genre of film in which the main emphasis is on humour. These films are designed to make the audience laugh through amusement and most often work by exaggerating characteristics for humorous effect. Films in this style traditionally have a happy ending black comedy being an exception.

Director.Name: Martin McDonagh
Director.Bio: Martin McDonagh was born on March 26, 1970 in Camberwell, London, England. He is a writer and director, known for In Bruges, Three Billboards Outside Ebbing, Missouri and Seven Psychopaths.

Title: Being John Malkovich
Description: A puppeteer discovers a portal that leads literally into the head of movie star John Malkovich.

Genre.Name: Drama
Genre.Description: Drama film is a genre that relies on the emotional and relational development of realistic characters. While Drama film relies heavily on this kind of development, dramatic themes play a large role in the plot as well. Often, these dramatic themes are taken from intense, real life issues.

Director.Name: Spike Jonze
Director.Bio: Spike Jonze made up one-third along with Andy Jenkins and Mark Lewman of the trio behind Dirt Magazine. Jonze was also responsible for directing the famous Beastie Boys: Sabotage 1994 short film as well as numerous other music videos for various artists.

Title: Little Women
Description: Four sisters come of age in America in the aftermath of the Civil War.

Genre.Name: Romance
Genre.Description: Romance film can be defined as a genre wherein the plot revolves around the love between two protagonists. This genre usually has a theme that explores an issue within love, including but not limited to: love at first sight, forbidden love, love triangles, and sacrificial love. The tone of Romance film can vary greatly. Whether the end is happy or tragic, Romance film aims to evoke strong emotions in the audience.

Director.Name: Greta Gerwig
Director.Bio: Greta Gerwig is an American actress, playwright, screenwriter, and director. She has collaborated with Noah Baumbach on several films, including Greenberg, Frances Ha, and Mistress America. Gerwig made her solo directorial debut with the critically acclaimed comedy-drama film Lady Bird, which she also wrote.

Title: The Darjeeling Limited
Description: A year after their father's funeral, three brothers travel across India by train in an attempt to bond with each other. It does not go well.

Genre.Name: Comedy
Genre.Description: A comedy film is a genre of film in which the main emphasis is on humour. These films are designed to make the audience laugh through amusement and most often work by exaggerating characteristics for humorous effect. Films in this style traditionally have a happy ending black comedy being an exception.

Director.Bio: Wesley Wales Anderson is a writer and director who was born in Houston, Texas. He made his first film, Bottle Rocket with Owen Wilson in 1996.
